title: AI Employees
description:
AI Employees are not simple chatbots — they are intelligent colleagues who understand business context and can directly execute tasks.
They are seamlessly integrated into your system, working collaboratively with humans to bring true automation and intelligence to the enterprise.
description_cn:
AI 员工不是简单的聊天机器人，而是能理解业务上下文、直接执行任务的智能同事。
他们无缝融入系统，与人协同工作，为企业带来真正的自动化与智能化。
description_ja:
AI Employees are not simple chatbots — they are intelligent colleagues who understand business context and can directly execute tasks.
They are seamlessly integrated into your system, working collaboratively with humans to bring true automation and intelligence to the enterprise.
